com.samsung.android.sdk.remotesensor

Class SrsRemoteSensorEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.remotesensor.SrsRemoteSensorEvent

  • public class SrsRemoteSensorEvent
extends Object
    This class represents a sensor event and holds event information such as the sensor type, timestamp, accuracy and sensor data.
    See Also:
    SrsRemoteSensorManager.EventListener, SrsRemoteSensorEvent, SrsRemoteSensor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int accuracy
      Accuracy of the event.
      SrsRemoteSensor sensor
      Sensor that generated the event.
      long timestamp
      Time when the event occurred, in milliseconds.
      float[] values
      Array of sensor values.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • values

        public float[] values
        Array of sensor values. The length and content of the values array depends on which sensor type is being monitored (see also SrsRemoteSensorEvent for a definition of the coordinate system used).

        With the SrsRemoteSensor.TYPE_USER_ACTIVITY sensor, values[0] can have three values. UNKNOWN STATE (0.0f), WALK(1.0f) or RUN(2.0f)

        With the SrsRemoteSensor.TYPE_PEDOMETER sensor, values[0] has a step counter started at the start of the day (00h:00m:00s) This event is updated every 5 minutes to reduce the power consumption of wearable device.

        With the SrsRemoteSensor.TYPE_WEARING_STATE sensor, values[0] can have two values. Not Wearing(0.0f) or Wearing(1.0f)

      • sensor

        public SrsRemoteSensor sensor
        Sensor that generated the event.

      • accuracy

        public int accuracy
        Accuracy of the event.

      • timestamp

        public long timestamp
        Time when the event occurred, in milliseconds.
